# `roll up` for [filters](/commands/categories/filters.md)

<div class='command-title'>Roll table rows up.</div>

## Signature

```> roll up {flags} ```

## Flags

 -  `--by, -b {int}`: Number of rows to roll


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| table | table  |

## Examples

Rolls rows up
```nu
> [[a b]; [1 2] [3 4] [5 6]] | roll up
╭───┬───┬───╮
│ # │ a │ b │
├───┼───┼───┤
│ 0 │ 3 │ 4 │
│ 1 │ 5 │ 6 │
│ 2 │ 1 │ 2 │
╰───┴───┴───╯

```
